item.title: I love you all, but not as much as my couch.
item.description:
Sorry we've all been a bit crud at blogging lately. We're all quite hungover still, it doesn't mean we don't love you, because we do. We love the way your hair glistens in the computer monitor glow, and the sweet little smile you get when you come to schitz to get awesome tunes, we think your perfect, really, but it's just that pink garage sale couch here, she's so soft, and she can give us something you can't right now. I hope you understand.

I was going to right a really impressive list of all my favourite bangers of 2008, and you all would have loved it I'm sure, but you see, couch... she's gently cushioning me, and TV, he's got the new Narnia on. 

So here, just take these, no really, I insist, I hope they can tide you over until we get our act together.




Drop off Service - Shacks (dub)



Acid Girls - On the What (Liteworx) Removed By request

item.title: Klassix = Idea Bank
item.description:
Not sure who's got the time to upload old rave cuts to youtube with a view of the record label in the shot but i think i'm gonna tag in and take over. now if i can only get around to getting the 2000 pieces of hand picked late 80s early 90s vinyl under my bed onto a huge ikea shelf à la 5x5.

Put it on the to do list, or the New Year's resolution.

Here's a few tear jerkers.....look but don't touch :)



if you dig deep back to my first posts i think i dropped a couple-o-320 bangers from his album.
PM Dawn 4 Life



and what were YOU doing in 1987? dead or alive, it surely wasn't making music like this....








tear....






k i could go on forever.....

to be continued :)

item.author: noreply@blogger.com (®©)

item.title: Ween Wednesday!!!!!!!!! .07
item.description:
Wellll, it's been awhile since we've had alil' D & G for all u SchitHeadz out there.
I think it was about this time a few years back when my old roomie - super Ween fan Michael almost got us kick outta on the street.
He had worked like 52 hours straight at the Naam and was 6 Beefeater gin martini's deep, when he thought it was time to turn on the red light and run a big old Jim Morrison Bath.................... And past-out cold.
The key word(s) being past-out.
He never make it to the bath.
See we have one of the rad old school claw-foot tubs, and as sexy as they are, not sooo safe.
No over-flow drain.
We live on the third floor.
Water rained through the two floors under us.
The landlord busted down the door to turn off the water, and wondered why nobody was home.
Michael never woke-up.............................................





WEEN - The Fucked Jam





WEEN - Don't Sweat It


Buy the schitz. iTunes





†øƒø-∂øg

item.title: Shitz Shook in the Hammer
item.description:
Here in Hamilton Ont. things are not as friendly as on the left coast,  lets just say its colder and rougher around the edges out here.  This annual trip back to the 905 has been no exception.

Cruising through the city late last night I was rockin this remix of one of my favorite east coast hip hop tracks..  Mobb Deep - Shook Ones Part II

An sick mash up of new and old.. fast and slow.  Play it on some big speakers.



Dj Fashen - Shook
                              
Buy the shitz. iTunes or Beatport

Peace, 
Frost

item.title: Life hands you Lemons......
item.description:
Ya know how those positive peeps always say 'when life hands you lemons, you should make lemonade' or something along those lines. Well, fuck them. Sometimes you should just point fingers, get mad, and start throwing shit around.


My anger management issues in turn leads to music of course, because at the end of the day music is my life and with the ups and downs so goes the tempo and BPM's. A few dark, dark wreck shit up jams for your ears........




FreQ Nasty vs Propa Tingz - Peacemaker


FreQ Nasty


Chase and Status




Chase and Status & VC - The Grudge


I feel better already.





We are lucky here in Vancity cause the one the only Fake Blood is gracing us with a set tomorrow night and what better way to let out some frustration then on a sweaty dance floor with Theo's signature bass hard stompers. Can not wait.




Fake Blood Minimix

item.title: Here Boy.....
item.description:
If an alien was looking down on earth and monitoring our planet to try and figure out who or what the supreme being is, the alien might think that we humans are merely the slaves of the K9. Srsly, think about it. We spend all day working to make money that we in turn spend on food and toys for our masters. We are reprimanded by their vicious barking screams when they are upset with us and we are led around by a leash while they get exercise. To top it all off, we pick up their excrement should they grace us with a turd.





Sooo, with all things popping in the way of schitz these days it's been hard to get posts up on a regular so I'm gonna make up with a flurry over the next few here.




Kid Cudi Vs. Crookers - Day 'N' Nite (Agent X Remix)




Burns - Make Love




Hostage - Shake It (AC Slater Remix)

item.title: I have a fever, a mustache fever
item.description:
Okay I had a pretty effing rad weekend, a weekend full of lots of crazy legs dancing, good brunches, fun photo shoots in gold pants and water slides. Ya that's right I said water slides! I know what you're thinking... "It's December, you're an effing nutbar, blondtron!!!" Well they are indoors, and granted they are a bit of a drive and I thought for a second my friends were taking me to a marshland to rob and murder me, just trust that they are well worth the effort. Grey Goose slurpies help.

After successfully creeping out the 6th grade swim team in the shower....

"Hey, any of you have some conditioner? Two in one? What the crap! Have you ever heard of split ends?"

I emerged from the ladies locker room with frizzy ass hair only to discover the greatest vending machine of all time, angels sang, I dropped to my knees. FUNKY FACE DISGUISE....

HOLY CRAP A MUSTACHE VENDING MACHINE. 

How exciting!!!! These tracks are almost as exciting, but I don't know if that moment will ever be topped!






The Kills - U R A Fever (Jazzsteppa Remix)



N.A.S.A - Gifted feat. Kanye West, Santogold + Lykke Li

Holy CRAP this N.A.S.A bizniz is NUTS. Totally amazing!

And fresh from Attorney Street it's cousin cole's acid dubs of Kanye West's Champion.



Kanye West - Champion (Cousin Cole Acid Dub Fast)



Kanye West - Champion (Cousin Cole Acid Dub Slow)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (blondtron)

item.title: I Love You Miss Robot :: Trevor Horn Pt. 2
item.description:
Hello, my Schitty people!

I am your host - HASHMODER - I shit you not!

Before reading this blog .......... I strongly recommend that you read (if you haven't done so) or re-read (if you don't remember) my last post about producer extraordinaire Trevor Horn's dynamic 12-inch .......... and then come back here for more Horn'ful penetration.


::::: Quick recap:

This is Trevor Horn...
He's the guy who produced and performed "Video Killed The Radio Star" world-wide smash-hit track. And he's collecting millions of dollars of royalties from it.

I did some major digging and discovered some fascinating, forgotten facts and hidden gem tracks from The Buggles.

In 1980, the Buggles' duo Geoffrey Downes (keyboards) and Trevor Horn (vocals) -- who were coming off an international success with their New Wave album The Age of Plastic and the acclaimed single "Video Killed the Radio Star" - to help out on a new YES album. Downes suddenly left Buggles when Trevor learned that YES' keyboardist Rick Wakeman was leaving the band, and therefore snatched him as well as lead-vocalist Jon Anderson to work on the next Buggles album Adventures In Modern Recording. The Buggle's second album was completed in 1981 but was never released or charted. The album was a gem masterpiece.


::::: A little bit of YES...

This is Rick Wakeman.
This is Jon Anderson.
During 1981-1983, Jon Anderson worked with Vangelis who's famous for Blade Runner soundtrack and Oscar-winning theme for Chariots Of Fire.

YES biggest hit single was 1983's Owner Of The Lonely Heart.

MP3 promo here


::::: Buggle's 2nd Album - Age In Modern Recording...

Since this album was never charted, there was only one single released as a 12-inch ......... an absolutely incredible track I Am A Camera with Wakeman on the keys and Anderson on the mic, which can be heard below, among few bonus tracks.

The Buggles - I Am A Camera (12 Inch)


Listen to the all the instrument layers, arrangements and chord progressions.




The Buggles - On TV




The Buggles - Blue Nylon




:::: Buggle's 1st Album - The Age Of Plastic...


The Buggles - I Love You Miss Robot




The Buggles - Clean Clean




The Buggles - Astroboy




The Buggles - The Living In The Age Of Plastic




Tune in next time for the 3rd and biggest mind-blasting part of Trevor Horn and the ART OF NOISE.

Your host,

HASHMODER

}:-)


.

item.title: Mo Money! Mo N.A.S.A.!
item.description:
What they say?
Money is the root of all evil?
No, can't be.
They say the same thing about media you know.
The only real weapon of mass destruction they say.
But they say alot of things don'tcha know.
What do they know anyway?



Art by Ric Stultz


Coming to us via URB.com is the exclusive premier of N.A.S.A., "Money." This is the first song off the duo of Sam Spiegel (Squeak E. Clean) and DJ Zegon's five-years-in-the-making album, featuring the world music revolution of Chuck D, Ras Congo, Seu Jorge, Z-Trip—and David Byrne on the hook!




Money - N.A.S.A. feat. Chuck D, Ras Congo, Sea Jorge, Z-Trip, and David Byrne

item.author: schitheadz@schoolofmix.com (Dr † Wrex)

item.title: Blondtron Thong...
item.description:
So This Friday morning hit me hard, hard as in I woke up late to work to my clothes strewn about the apartment with pizza sauce still on my effing face. That kind of hard. I was a useless sack of hotness at work, yet somehow, in pretending to make a spread sheet while I was actually trying to get my set ready for my radio show Hot Mess, I managed to make a kind of sweet little mash-up. You see, when I'm hungover, I really, really, really enjoy some late 90's favourites. In this case, it was that oh so sweet voiced Sisqo that inspired. If you have ever heard me sing the thong song in karaoke, consider yourself a blessed soul. Take of your g-strings ladies and shake those koochie lips!






Blondtron - Better Thong




Blondtron - Ballin'
